header: A Sign regarding Egypt and Cush

verse: In the year the commander-in-chief came to Ashdod, when Sargon the king of Assyria sent him, and he fought against Ashdod and he took it,
at that time, Yahweh had spoken by the hand of Isaiah son of Amoz, saying,
Then Yahweh said, â€œJust as my servant Isaiah has walked naked and barefoot three years as a sign and a portent against Egypt and Cush,
so shall the king of Assyria lead the captives of Egypt and the exiles of Cush, young and old, naked and barefoot, with bared buttocks, the shame of Egypt.
And the inhabitant of the coastland will say this on that day:
